Name: Sub Problem
Problem Configuration.Description: Provides results from one previous Korali execution.

Name: Psi Problem
Problem Configuration.Description: Provides results from the hierarchical problem (Psi).

Name: Type
Variables Configuration.Description: Specifies the purpose of the variable for the bayesian model.

Name: Sub Problem LogLikelihood
Internal Settings.Description: Evaluation of the conditional-prior generated samples from the subproblem.

Name: Psi Problem Variables Count
Internal Settings.Description: Number of variables in the psi-problem. Must be equal to the number of conditional priors in the hierarchical problem.

Name: Psi Problem Sample Coordinates
Internal Settings.Description: Coordinates for each sample on the psi-problem.

Name: Psi Problem Sample Log Likelihoods
Internal Settings.Description: Likelihood for each sample on the psi-problem.

Name: Psi Problem Sample Log Priors
Internal Settings.Description: Log Priors for each sample on the psi-problem
